title: Lil slugger trundle Easter eggs
body: I've found catch-got, possibly Janna in the blimp, and maybe braum in the background, flexing his muscles

replies.body: Traditional Trundle also has old Pre-rework traditional Trundles face etched into the chair.
Poppy was a good lesson wasn' t she?
Old 5th age Taric splash is also in riot girl Tristanas phone in the new 5th Age Taric splash :)

... i noticed only now the tristana in the splash. This is what many of the posts made at taric reveal meant, i did not understood them initially...

ok, gotta buy a name change and recall myself "slowpoke" at this point :P
Also saw Debonair Ezreal in that splash too as well as DJ Sona
you arent supposed to give us this info! we find it out ourselves like the smol childs we are!
Actually it's been said it's {{champion:53}}  not {{champion:6}}
You can see the pipes in the back, it's him alright.
betting on catcher urgot as a rework skin, right now.
